Description: Fired when an element is clicked
Fired when an element is double-clicked
Fired when a mouse button is pressed
Fired when a mouse button is released
Fired when the mouse is moved over an element
Fired when the mouse enters an element (doesn’t bubble)
Fired when the mouse leaves an element (doesn’t bubble)
Fired when the mouse moves over an element (bubbles)
Fired when the mouse moves out of an element (bubbles)
Fired when a key is pressed
Fired when a key is pressed and held (deprecated in React 17+)
Fired when a key is released
Fired when the value of an input changes
Fired every time user input changes
Fired when a form is submitted
Fired when an element gains focus
Fired when an element loses focus
Fired when a form element fails validation
Fired when a form is reset
Fired when content is copied
Fired when content is cut
Fired when content is pasted
Fired when media playback starts
Fired when playback is paused
Fired when playback reaches the end
Fired when volume changes
Fired as media plays and playback position changes
Fired when media data is loaded
Fired when an error occurs during media playback
Fired continuously while dragging
Fired when dragging starts
Fired when dragging ends
Fired when a dragged item enters a valid drop target
Fired when a dragged item leaves a valid drop target
Fired when a dragged item is over a drop target
Fired when an item is dropped
Fired when a pointer (mouse, pen, touch) is pressed
Fired when a pointer is released
Fired when the pointer moves
Fired when pointer enters an element
Fired when a touch starts
Fired when a finger moves across screen
Fired when a touch ends
Fired when a touch is interrupted
Fired when an element is scrolled
Fired when the window is resized
Fired when an element or resource is loaded
Fired when a resource fails to load
